Posts.Content: I would insist on mammogram ultrasound and biopsy to put your mind at rest xx Report Hi thanks for reply, I did and all came back clear.Â  I stopped worrying about it so much and now have been taking HRT for longer all seems to be settling down, although still have the strange colouring but GP said probably just the weight of them as I am a GG cup. Take care Report
Posts.Title: Really scared just need to talk
